text: Fil waqeh Allah ne apne Rasool ko saccha khwab dikhaya tha jo theek theek haqq ke mutabiq tha. Insha Allah tum zaroor masjid e haram mein purey aman ke saath dakhil hongey, apne sar mundwa-ogey (shave) aur baal tarashwa-ogey aur tumhein koi khauff na hoga. Woh us baat ko janta tha jisey tum na jante thay is liye woh khwab pura honay se pehle usne yeh qareebi fatah tumko ata farmadi
